sentence.Network_en: Next time I saw him, he was walking hatless along the street at dusk.
sentence.Network_cn: 我第二次看见他是傍晚的时候, 他光着头在街上走.

sentence.Network_en: He dashed into my room , hatless , barefooted, and out of breath.
sentence.Network_cn: 他光头赤脚, 气喘吁吁地冲进屋来.
